attributes.action: More funding to ensure the safety of patients in the mental health system
attributes.additional_details: The Government needs to provide more funding to ensure that this happens in every care setting for patients so they are kept safe .
attributes.background: People who are in the mental health care system should be given the correct and high quality care they need in a setting that has enough people to care for them and who are fully trained to make sure they are well treated and well protected and not feel more vulnerable than they already are.
